A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I'm a long time Star Wars fan and I took my kids to see TLJ. It was horrible! I will never pay to watch another Star Wars movie again. The pacing was awful\, the story was complete garbage and the CGI was laughable. A few people left the theater\, during the quiet scenes people would openly scoff in bewilderment. I was going into this movie with decent expectations\, not only was I disappointed I feel like the franchise I love is dead. Even my children and my teen son disliked it\, words can not properly express how ripped off we all felt. Do yourself a favor and stay home!
